parameters: Like last time, please take your jacket off when you sit down.
We'll start with your vitals again.
Hold your arm out for me, please.
Pulse of 75. Higher than last time.
You must have to get to your shift soon. Right?
Oh, no. I donâ€™t work tonight. I just figured you guys probably close at 5:00.
That's true, but no need to run next time. I will be here.
Or you could come in earlier next week.
Well, my shifts are usually either 10:00 to 4:00 or 6:00 to 12:00...
So this time is kinda, like, safe either way.
Was there anything unusual last time?
That, I don't know. I'm just the data collector here.
Knowing those results could bias one or both of us in some way.
That's just a standard double blind study parameter. The "why" is beyond my paygrade.
Okay. I am going to touch your arm.
No. May I touch your arm?
Sorry. I forget the script. My employer is very particular about the script.
That "why" is above my paygrade too.
There's that vein. It's barely visible.
It makes me a little queasy, but I'm fine.
I used to donate plasma for money, so.
It'd make me too faint to go into work after. I passed out on the clock a couple times.
I'll remove the needle and wrap your arm now.
Do you\| have any other color bandages? Like purple or blue?
One more needle. This is the medication itself.
Roll your shirt sleeve up, please.
Not as smooth as last time, I guess.
I mean, it was still pretty smooth.
Shall I bandage the injection site?
No, I think it's fine. Thanks.
Just checking. You can put your jacket back on, then.
A trash can with a sharps container on the wall next to it.
"Balanced Rock" by Hyrum LaVette. He's got better work than this.
A computer from the 90s, by the looks of it.
A computer from the 90s, by the looks of it.
Swabs, cotton balls, tongue depressors, and applicators.
It's a chair, but not the one I'm supposed to sit in.
It's a chair, but not the one I'm supposed to sit in.
There was kind of, like, an icy burn this time...
That would probably be the lubcricating agent, not the active ingredients.
Again, please note any changes you observe this week and report them to me.
I came all the way here. I'm seeing this through.
